title: The Novel’s Extra - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   School Life
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Alternate World   Archery   Arrogant Characters   Average-looking Protagonist   Battle Academy   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Cheats   Childcare   Cute Children   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Dungeons   Enemies Become Allies   Firearms   Friends Become Enemies   Futuristic Setting   Game Elements   Guilds   Gunfighters   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heroes   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Lucky Protagonist   Magical Technology   Male Protagonist   Mercenaries   Military   Misunderstandings   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Multiple Identities   Multiple POV   Mysterious Past   Poor to Rich   Resurrection   Romantic Subplot   Schemes And Conspiracies   Skill Creation   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Time Skip   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Underestimated Protagonist   Unique Weapon User   Weak to Strong   Writers
author: Jee Gab Song   지갑송
description:
Waking up, Kim Hajin finds himself in a familiar world but an unfamiliar body.

A world he created himself and a story he wrote, yet never finished.

He had become his novel’s extra, a filler character with no importance to the story.

The only clue to escaping is to stay close to the main storyline.

However, he soon finds out the world isn’t exactly identical to his creation.>
